MovieTheater.name: Pinepolis
MovieTheater.location: 4th Floor, Terapolis Mall, 1858/1 Thakur Main Road
MovieTheater.description: Trendy theater with funky decor and state-of-the-art technology.

MovieTheater.name: ENOX
MovieTheater.description: Modern theater with state-of-the-art facilities and luxurious seating.

MovieTheater.name: TVR
MovieTheater.description: Chic and contemporary theater with comfortable seating and excellent acoustics.

Movie.name: The Batman
Movie.description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

Movie.name: Pathan
Movie.description: A retired RAW agent returns to the field to save his country from an imminent terrorist threat.

Movie.name: John Wick
Movie.description: After the death of his beloved wife, a retired hitman seeks vengeance against the people who wronged him.

Movie.name: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
Movie.description: A young man and woman fall in love on a trip across Europe, but their respective families disapprove of their relationship.

Movie.name: Naruto Shippuden the Movie
Movie.description: Naruto and his friends must stop a mysterious group of ninja who plan to unleash the power of a dangerous ancient relic.

Movie.name: American Pie Presents: The Naked Mile
Movie.description: Erik Stifler, a college student, decides to participate in the Naked Mile run, a tradition in which participants run naked around the campus.
